trans-unit.source: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to connect and manage StorSimple devices | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to connect and manage StorSimple devices | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use the StorSimple Snapshot Manager MMC snap-in to connect and manage StorSimple devices.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to use the StorSimple Snapshot Manager MMC snap-in to connect and manage StorSimple devices.

trans-unit.source: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to connect and manage StorSimple devices
trans-unit.target: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to connect and manage StorSimple devices

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: You can use nodes in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager Scope pane to verify imported StorSimple device data and refresh connected storage devices.
trans-unit.target: You can use nodes in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager Scope pane to verify imported StorSimple device data and refresh connected storage devices.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when you click the Devices node, you can see a list of connected devices and corresponding status information in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, when you click the Devices node, you can see a list of connected devices and corresponding status information in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Connected devices</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Connected devices</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 1: StorSimple Snapshot Manager connected device
trans-unit.target: Figure 1: StorSimple Snapshot Manager connected device

trans-unit.source: Depending on your View selections, the Results pane shows the following information about each device.
trans-unit.target: Depending on your View selections, the Results pane shows the following information about each device.

trans-unit.source: (For more information about configuring a view, go to <link><linkText>View menu</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: (For more information about configuring a view, go to <link><linkText>View menu</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Results column
trans-unit.target: Results column

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: The name of the device as configured in the Microsoft Azure Management Portal
trans-unit.target: The name of the device as configured in the Microsoft Azure Management Portal

trans-unit.source: Model
trans-unit.target: Model

trans-unit.source: The model number of the device
trans-unit.target: The model number of the device

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.target: Version

trans-unit.source: The version of the software installed on the device
trans-unit.target: The version of the software installed on the device

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Whether the device is available
trans-unit.target: Whether the device is available

trans-unit.source: Last Synced
trans-unit.target: Last Synced

trans-unit.source: Date and time when the device was last synchronized
trans-unit.target: Date and time when the device was last synchronized

trans-unit.source: Serial No.
trans-unit.target: Serial No.

trans-unit.source: The serial number for the device
trans-unit.target: The serial number for the device

trans-unit.source: If you right-click the Devices node in the Scope pane, you can select from the following actions:
trans-unit.target: If you right-click the Devices node in the Scope pane, you can select from the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Add or replace a device
trans-unit.target: Add or replace a device

trans-unit.source: Connect a device and verify imports
trans-unit.target: Connect a device and verify imports

trans-unit.source: Refresh connected devices
trans-unit.target: Refresh connected devices

trans-unit.source: If you click the Devices node and then right-click a device name in the Results pane, you can select from the following actions:
trans-unit.target: If you click the Devices node and then right-click a device name in the Results pane, you can select from the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Authenticate a device
trans-unit.target: Authenticate a device

trans-unit.source: View device details
trans-unit.target: View device details

trans-unit.source: Refresh a device
trans-unit.target: Refresh a device

trans-unit.source: Delete a device configuration
trans-unit.target: Delete a device configuration

trans-unit.source: Change a device password
trans-unit.target: Change a device password

trans-unit.source: All of these actions are also available in the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: All of these actions are also available in the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to connect and manage devices and perform the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how to use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to connect and manage devices and perform the following tasks:

trans-unit.source: Add or replace a device
trans-unit.target: Add or replace a device

trans-unit.source: Connect a device and verify imports
trans-unit.target: Connect a device and verify imports

trans-unit.source: Refresh connected devices
trans-unit.target: Refresh connected devices

trans-unit.source: Authenticate a device
trans-unit.target: Authenticate a device

trans-unit.source: View device details
trans-unit.target: View device details

trans-unit.source: Refresh an individual device
trans-unit.target: Refresh an individual device

trans-unit.source: Delete a device configuration
trans-unit.target: Delete a device configuration

trans-unit.source: Change an expired device password
trans-unit.target: Change an expired device password

trans-unit.source: Replace a failed device
trans-unit.target: Replace a failed device

trans-unit.source: For general information about using the StorSimple Snapshot Manager interface, go to <link><linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For general information about using the StorSimple Snapshot Manager interface, go to <link><linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Add or replace a device
trans-unit.target: Add or replace a device

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to add or replace a StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to add or replace a StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To add or replace a device
trans-unit.target: To add or replace a device

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click the Devices node, and then click Configure a device.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click the Devices node, and then click Configure a device.

trans-unit.source: The Configure a Device dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The Configure a Device dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure a StorSimple device</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure a StorSimple device</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Device drop-down box, select the IP address of the device or virtual device.
trans-unit.target: In the Device drop-down box, select the IP address of the device or virtual device.

trans-unit.source: In the Password text box, type the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password that you created for the device in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: In the Password text box, type the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password that you created for the device in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.
trans-unit.target: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager searches for the device that you identified.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager searches for the device that you identified.

trans-unit.source: If the device is available, StorSimple Snapshot Manager adds a connection.
trans-unit.target: If the device is available, StorSimple Snapshot Manager adds a connection.

trans-unit.source: If the device is unavailable for any reason, StorSimple Snapshot Manager returns an error message.
trans-unit.target: If the device is unavailable for any reason, StorSimple Snapshot Manager returns an error message.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the error message, and then click Cancel to close the Configure a Device dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Click OK to close the error message, and then click Cancel to close the Configure a Device dialog box.

trans-unit.source: Connect a device and verify imports
trans-unit.target: Connect a device and verify imports

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to connect a StorSimple device and verify that any existing volume groups that have associated backups are imported.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to connect a StorSimple device and verify that any existing volume groups that have associated backups are imported.

trans-unit.source: To connect a device and verify imports
trans-unit.target: To connect a device and verify imports

trans-unit.source: To connect a device to StorSimple Snapshot Manager, follow the instructions in Add or replace a device.
trans-unit.target: To connect a device to StorSimple Snapshot Manager, follow the instructions in Add or replace a device.

trans-unit.source: When it connects to a device, StorSimple Snapshot Manager responds as follows:
trans-unit.target: When it connects to a device, StorSimple Snapshot Manager responds as follows:

trans-unit.source: If the device is unavailable for any reason, StorSimple Snapshot Manager returns an error message.
trans-unit.target: If the device is unavailable for any reason, StorSimple Snapshot Manager returns an error message.

trans-unit.source: If the device is available, StorSimple Snapshot Manager adds a connection.
trans-unit.target: If the device is available, StorSimple Snapshot Manager adds a connection.

trans-unit.source: When you select the device, it appears in the Results pane, and the status field indicates that the device is Available.
trans-unit.target: When you select the device, it appears in the Results pane, and the status field indicates that the device is Available.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager imports any volume groups configured for the device, provided that the volume groups have associated backups.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager imports any volume groups configured for the device, provided that the volume groups have associated backups.

trans-unit.source: Backup policies are not imported.
trans-unit.target: Backup policies are not imported.

trans-unit.source: Volume groups that do not have associated backups are not imported.
trans-unit.target: Volume groups that do not have associated backups are not imported.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the top node in the Scope pane, and then click Toggle Imports Display.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the top node in the Scope pane, and then click Toggle Imports Display.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Select Toggle Imports Display</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Select Toggle Imports Display</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The Toggle Imports Display dialog box appears, showing the status of the imported volume groups and backups.
trans-unit.target: The Toggle Imports Display dialog box appears, showing the status of the imported volume groups and backups.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.
trans-unit.target: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: After the volume groups and backups are successfully imported, you can use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to manage them, just as you would manage volume groups and backups that you created and configured with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: After the volume groups and backups are successfully imported, you can use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to manage them, just as you would manage volume groups and backups that you created and configured with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Refresh connected devices
trans-unit.target: Refresh connected devices

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to synchronize the connected StorSimple devices with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to synchronize the connected StorSimple devices with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To refresh connected devices
trans-unit.target: To refresh connected devices

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click Devices, and then click Refresh Devices.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click Devices, and then click Refresh Devices.

trans-unit.source: This synchronizes the connected devices with StorSimple Snapshot Manager so that you can view the volume groups and backups, including any recent additions.
trans-unit.target: This synchronizes the connected devices with StorSimple Snapshot Manager so that you can view the volume groups and backups, including any recent additions.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Refresh the StorSimple devices</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Refresh the StorSimple devices</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The Refresh Devices action retrieves any new volume groups and any associated backups from connected devices.
trans-unit.target: The Refresh Devices action retrieves any new volume groups and any associated backups from connected devices.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Rescan volumes action available for the Volumes node, Refresh Devices does not restore the backup registry.
trans-unit.target: Unlike the Rescan volumes action available for the Volumes node, Refresh Devices does not restore the backup registry.

trans-unit.source: Authenticate a device
trans-unit.target: Authenticate a device

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to authenticate a StorSimple device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to authenticate a StorSimple device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate a device
trans-unit.target: To authenticate a device

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, click Devices.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, click Devices.

trans-unit.source: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Authenticate.
trans-unit.target: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Authenticate.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The Authenticate dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: Type the device password, and then click OK.
trans-unit.target: Type the device password, and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Authenticate dialog box</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Authenticate dialog box</linkText>

trans-unit.source: View device details
trans-unit.target: View device details

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to view the details of a StorSimple device and, if necessary, resynchronize the device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to view the details of a StorSimple device and, if necessary, resynchronize the device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To view and resynchronize device details
trans-unit.target: To view and resynchronize device details

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, click Devices.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, click Devices.

trans-unit.source: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Details.
trans-unit.target: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Details.

trans-unit.source: The Device Details dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The Device Details dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: This box shows the name, model, version, serial number, status, target iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN), and last synchronization date and time.
trans-unit.target: This box shows the name, model, version, serial number, status, target iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN), and last synchronization date and time.

trans-unit.source: Click Resync to synchronize the device.
trans-unit.target: Click Resync to synchronize the device.

trans-unit.source: Click OK or Cancel to close the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Click OK or Cancel to close the dialog box.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Device details</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Device details</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Refresh an individual device
trans-unit.target: Refresh an individual device

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to resynchronize an individual StorSimple device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to resynchronize an individual StorSimple device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To refresh a device
trans-unit.target: To refresh a device

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, click Devices.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, click Devices.

trans-unit.source: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Refresh Device.
trans-unit.target: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Refresh Device.

trans-unit.source: This synchronizes the device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: This synchronizes the device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Delete a device configuration
trans-unit.target: Delete a device configuration

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to delete an individual StorSimple device configuration from StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to delete an individual StorSimple device configuration from StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To delete a device configuration
trans-unit.target: To delete a device configuration

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, click Devices.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, click Devices.

trans-unit.source: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Delete.
trans-unit.target: In the Results pane, right-click the name of the device, and then click Delete.

trans-unit.source: The following message appears.
trans-unit.target: The following message appears.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to delete the configuration or click No to cancel the deletion.
trans-unit.target: Click Yes to delete the configuration or click No to cancel the deletion.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Delete device configuration</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Delete device configuration</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Change an expired device password
trans-unit.target: Change an expired device password

trans-unit.source: You must enter a password to authenticate a StorSimple device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: You must enter a password to authenticate a StorSimple device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: You configure this password when you use the Windows PowerShell interface to set up the device.
trans-unit.target: You configure this password when you use the Windows PowerShell interface to set up the device.

trans-unit.source: However, the password can expire.
trans-unit.target: However, the password can expire.

trans-unit.source: If this happens, you can use the Microsoft Azure Management Portal to change the password.
trans-unit.target: If this happens, you can use the Microsoft Azure Management Portal to change the password.

trans-unit.source: Then, because the device was configured in StorSimple Snapshot Manager before the password expired, you must re-authenticate the device in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Then, because the device was configured in StorSimple Snapshot Manager before the password expired, you must re-authenticate the device in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To change the expired password
trans-unit.target: To change the expired password

trans-unit.source: On the Azure Management Portal, start the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure Management Portal, start the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Click Devices > Configure for the device.
trans-unit.target: Click Devices > Configure for the device.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the StorSimple Snapshot Manager section.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the StorSimple Snapshot Manager section.

trans-unit.source: Enter a password that is 14-15 characters.
trans-unit.target: Enter a password that is 14-15 characters.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the password contains a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the password contains a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters.

trans-unit.source: Re-enter the password to confirm it.
trans-unit.target: Re-enter the password to confirm it.

trans-unit.source: Click Save at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Save at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: To re-authenticate the device
trans-unit.target: To re-authenticate the device

trans-unit.source: Start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, click Devices.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, click Devices.

trans-unit.source: A list of configured devices appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: A list of configured devices appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Select the device, right-click, and then click Authenticate.
trans-unit.target: Select the device, right-click, and then click Authenticate.

trans-unit.source: In the Authenticate window, enter the new password.
trans-unit.target: In the Authenticate window, enter the new password.

trans-unit.source: Select the device, right-click, and select Refresh device.
trans-unit.target: Select the device, right-click, and select Refresh device.

trans-unit.source: This synchronizes the device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: This synchronizes the device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Replace a failed device
trans-unit.target: Replace a failed device

trans-unit.source: If a StorSimple device fails and is replaced by a standby (failover) device, use the following steps to connect to the new device and view the associated backups.
trans-unit.target: If a StorSimple device fails and is replaced by a standby (failover) device, use the following steps to connect to the new device and view the associated backups.

trans-unit.source: To connect to a new device after failover
trans-unit.target: To connect to a new device after failover

trans-unit.source: Reconfigure the iSCSI connection to the new device.
trans-unit.target: Reconfigure the iSCSI connection to the new device.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, go to "Step 7: Mount, initialize, and format a volume" in <link><linkText>Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions, go to "Step 7: Mount, initialize, and format a volume" in <link><linkText>Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: If the new StorSimple device has the same IP address as the old one, you might be able to connect the old configuration.
trans-unit.target: If the new StorSimple device has the same IP address as the old one, you might be able to connect the old configuration.

trans-unit.source: Stop the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:
trans-unit.target: Stop the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:

trans-unit.source: Start Server Manager.
trans-unit.target: Start Server Manager.

trans-unit.source: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the Tools menu, select Services.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the Tools menu, select Services.

trans-unit.source: On the Services window, select the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service.
trans-unit.target: On the Services window, select the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, under Microsoft StorSimple Management Service, click Stop the service.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, under Microsoft StorSimple Management Service, click Stop the service.

trans-unit.source: Remove the configuration information related to the old device:
trans-unit.target: Remove the configuration information related to the old device:

trans-unit.source: In File Explorer, browse to C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\StorSimple\BACatalog.
trans-unit.target: In File Explorer, browse to C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\StorSimple\BACatalog.

trans-unit.source: Delete the files in the BACatalog folder.
trans-unit.target: Delete the files in the BACatalog folder.

trans-unit.source: Restart the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:
trans-unit.target: Restart the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:

trans-unit.source: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the Tools menu, select Services.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the Tools menu, select Services.

trans-unit.source: On the Services window, select the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service.
trans-unit.target: On the Services window, select the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, under Microsoft StorSimple Management Service, click Restart the service.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, under Microsoft StorSimple Management Service, click Restart the service.

trans-unit.source: Start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To configure the new StorSimple device, complete the steps in Step 2: Connect a StorSimple device in <link><linkText>Deploy StorSimple Snapshot Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To configure the new StorSimple device, complete the steps in Step 2: Connect a StorSimple device in <link><linkText>Deploy StorSimple Snapshot Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the top-level node in the Scope pane (StorSimple Snapshot Manager in the example), and then click Toggle Imports Display.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the top-level node in the Scope pane (StorSimple Snapshot Manager in the example), and then click Toggle Imports Display.

trans-unit.source: A message appears when the imported volume groups and backups are visible in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: A message appears when the imported volume groups and backups are visible in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.
trans-unit.target: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to view and manage volumes</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to view and manage volumes</linkText><title></title></link>.
